content: Guansong PANG | School of Computing and Information Systems | School of Computing and Information Systems showSidebars == showTitleBreadcrumbs == 1 node.field_disable_title_breadcrumbs.value == Faculty Profile School of Computing and Information Systems SCIS Guansong PANG Full-time Faculty Assistant Professor of Computer Science; Lee Kong Chian Fellow Research StatementFaculty Homepage Qualification PhD, University of Technology Sydney, 2019 Teaching Topics Foundations of Cybersecurity Research Advisor/Co-Research Advisor to ZHU Jiawen QIAO Hezhe +65 68264864 gspang@smu.edu.sg Curriculum Vitae Research Areas School of Computing and Information SystemsArtificial Intelligence and Data ScienceData Management & MiningMachine Learning & IntelligenceHuman-Machine Collaborative SystemsMultimedia SystemsInformation Systems & TechnologyCybersecuritySafety, Security & FairnessMisinformation & DisinformationSecurity & Governance of Software/AI Systems Strategic Priorities Digital Transformation
